response.overview: Material entitled “XX” was filmed and recorded during the Polish leg of our 20th Anniversary Tour, shortly after the release of our 8th studio album “The Unquiet Sky”.  The show was filmed at Katowice’s Kinoteatr “Rialto.  “XX” is scheduled for a worldwide release on February, 12th 2016 via Metal Mind Productions  Tracks  1. The Demon Strikes  2. Rapture  3. Double Vision  4. Crack in the Ice  5. Moviedrome  6. How Did it Come to This?  7. Butterfly Man  8. Bedlam Fayre  9. Serenity  10. The Unquiet Sky  11. Traveller Beware  12. The City of Lanterns  13. Riding the Tide  14. Hanging Tree  15. The Tinder Box  16. Solomon  17. Don’t Forget to Breathe  18. Crying for Help 7
response.title: Arena XX
